start.text: No time to drink like now.
Look at us. We're *never* fully sober.
Who toooold youuuu we're nooot fineeeee?

start_boss.text: Gimme a bottle from the fridge!
Damn it, so much for making drinks.

retreat.text: Why aaare weee retreating? We aaare fiiiineeee...

out_of_missiles.text: Keep firing! Fire some more! Wha?... Oh, we're out...

need_help.text: I want bad man to go away..

engaged.text: Opa! Thissss is some real action! ....I think

running.text: I'll live to drink another day!

hull_90.text: My panel is all flashy, it'ssss sooo pretty..

hull_50.text: That'ssss not a fun screaming is it?
Has the party already started? ...Aw man

hull_30.text: Whhhhy me? I just want to drink in peace.

death.text: ~Oh danny boy, the pipes, the pipes are calling!~
